data.eml:eml: The status of the nomina Trapelus savignyi Audouin, 1827 and Agama savignii Duméril & Bibron, 1837 and the valid nomen of the Savigny’s Agama (Sauria: Agamidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wagner, Philipp, Crochet, Pierre-André (2009): The status of the nomina Trapelus savignyi Audouin, 1827 and Agama savignii Duméril & Bibron, 1837 and the valid nomen of the Savigny’s Agama (Sauria: Agamidae). Zootaxa 2209: 57-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275142
